member.name: T:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorEngine
member.summary: Provides the functionality to create a PDF document with or without Mixed Raster Content (MRC) segmentation options.

member.name: M:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorEngine.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes the PdfCompressorEngine SDK.

member.name: M:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorEngine.Insert(Leadtools.RasterImage)
member.summary: Compresses the specified image, without segmenting it, and inserts the image in the PDF file.
member.param: Image to be inserted in the PDF file.

member.name: M:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorEngine.Insert(Leadtools.RasterImage,Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorOptions)
member.summary: Segments the specified image using Mixed Raster Content (MRC segmentation) and then compresses it and inserts it into the PDF file.
member.param: Image to be inserted into the PDF file.
The PdfCompressorOptions structure that contains the options to be used to write the image to the PDF file.

member.name: M:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorEngine.InsertSegments(Leadtools.RasterImage,Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorSegmentsInfo[],System.Boolean,Leadtools.RasterColor)
member.summary: Applies the input Segments, compresses it, and inserts the image in the PDF file. This is provided for advanced usage.
member.param: Image to be inserted in the PDF file.
Contains information about all of the segments. PdfCompressorSegmentsInfo
Determines whether to use the average backgroundColor for all segments with background type or to use each color of each background segment.
Average background color, to be used for all backgrounds segments if \isThereBackGround\ is true.

member.name: M:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorEngine.SetCompression(Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorCompressionTypes)
member.summary: Sets the compression type to be used on each image segment inserted into the PDF file.
member.param: Provides information about PDF Compression options PdfCompressorCompressionTypes.

member.name: M:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorEngine.Write(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Writes the created file from memory to a .NET stream.
member.param: The output stream to be saved.

member.name: M:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorEngine.Write(System.String)
member.summary: Writes the created file from memory to the file system using the path provided.
member.param: The name of the output file to be saved.

member.name: M:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorEngine.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by this object.

member.name: M:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorEngine.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases all resources used by this object.
member.param: true, if this method was called as a result of calling Dispose.

member.name: M:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorEngine.Finalize
member.summary: Disposes of the PdfCompressorEngine SDK.

member.name: E:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorEngine.SegmentImage
member.summary: Optional delegate method for additional processing.

member.name: T:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorSegmentImageEventArgs
member.summary: Enables the user to approve or cancel the addition of any segment to the document.

member.name: M:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorSegmentImageEventArgs.#ctor(System.Int32,Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorSegmentsInfo)
member.summary: Initializes a new PdfCompressorSegmentImageEventArgs class object with default parameters.

member.name: P:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorSegmentImageEventArgs.Cancel
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a segment should be added to the document.
member.value: true if the segment should NOT be added to the PDF file; false if the segment is to be added to the PDF file.

member.name: P:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorSegmentImageEventArgs.Page
member.summary: Gets the index of the page on which the segment is being written.
member.value: The index of the page on which the segment is being written.

member.name: P:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorSegmentImageEventArgs.Segment
member.summary: Gets information about the segment.
member.value: Information about the segment.

member.name: T:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorSegmentsInfo
member.summary: Provides information about the bitmap segment.

member.name: M:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorSegmentsInfo.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of this class.

member.name: P:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorSegmentsInfo.Colors
member.summary: Gets or sets an array of colors for a segment.
member.value: An array of colors for a segment.

member.name: P:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorSegmentsInfo.Rectangle
member.summary: Gets or sets the dimensions for a segment.
member.value: The dimensions for a segment.

member.name: P:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorSegmentsInfo.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the segment type.
member.value: A value that indicates the segment type.

member.name: P:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorSegmentsInfo.ValidColors
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the number of colors contained in a segment.
member.value: A value that indicates the number of colors contained in a segment.

member.name: T:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.EnabledCompressionsFlags
member.summary: Flags that indicate which fields (PdfCompressor1BitCompression, PdfCompressor2BitCompression and PdfCompressorPictureCompression) will be read and set and which fields will be ignored.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.EnabledCompressionsFlags.None
member.summary: No compression is set, use default compressions.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.EnabledCompressionsFlags.EnableOneBit
member.summary: Enables setting 1BPP Compression type.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.EnabledCompressionsFlags.EnableTwoBit
member.summary: Enables setting 2BPP Compression type.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.EnabledCompressionsFlags.EnablePicture
member.summary: Enables setting Picture Compression type.

member.name: T:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressor1BitCompression
member.summary: Flags that specify the Compression type to be used with 1 bit images.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressor1BitCompression.Zip1Bit
member.summary: Use Zip Compression.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressor1BitCompression.Lzw1Bit
member.summary: Use LZW Compression.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressor1BitCompression.FaxG31D
member.summary: Use FAX CCITT G3 1D Compression.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressor1BitCompression.FaxG32D
member.summary: Use FAX CCITT G3 2D Compression.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressor1BitCompression.FaxG4
member.summary: Use FAX CCITT G4 Compression.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressor1BitCompression.Jbig2
member.summary: Use JBIG2 Compression.

member.name: T:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressor2BitCompression
member.summary: Flags that specify the Compression type to be used with 2 bits images.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressor2BitCompression.Zip2Bit
member.summary: Use Zip Compression.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressor2BitCompression.Lzw2Bit
member.summary: Use LZW Compression.

member.name: T:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorImageQuality
member.summary: Flags that identify the quality of the source image when working with the PDF Compressor.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorImageQuality.Unknown
member.summary: Unknown image quality. Use default handling.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorImageQuality.Noisy
member.summary: The source image is noisy.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorImageQuality.Scanned
member.summary: The source image is a scanned image.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorImageQuality.Printed
member.summary: The source image is a printed document.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorImageQuality.ComputerGenerated
member.summary: The source image is a high quality computer-generated image.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorImageQuality.Photo
member.summary: The source image is a high quality photo image; for example, from a digital camera.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorImageQuality.User
member.summary: The quality is set manually. This flag is for advanced users.

member.name: T:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorOutputQuality
member.summary: Flags that identify the quality of the output image when working with the PDF Compressor.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorOutputQuality.Auto
member.summary: Choose the quality of the output automatically.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorOutputQuality.Poor
member.summary: Poor output quality with best compression.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorOutputQuality.Average
member.summary: Average output quality with average compression.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorOutputQuality.Good
member.summary: Good output quality with good compression.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorOutputQuality.Excellent
member.summary: Excellent output quality with poor compression.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorOutputQuality.User
member.summary: The user detects the output quality. This flag is for advanced users.

member.name: T:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorPictureCompression
member.summary: Flags that identify the Compression type to be used for Picture images.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorPictureCompression.JpgPic
member.summary: Use JPEG 444 compression.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorPictureCompression.Jpg422Pic
member.summary: Use JPEG 422 compression.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorPictureCompression.Jpg411Pic
member.summary: Use JPEG 411 compression.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorPictureCompression.JpgProgressivePic
member.summary: Use JPEG 444 Progressive compression.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorPictureCompression.Jpg422ProgressivePic
member.summary: Use JPEG 422 Progressive compression.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorPictureCompression.Jpg411ProgressivePic
member.summary: Use JPEG 411 Progressive compression.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorPictureCompression.ZipPic
member.summary: Use ZIP compression.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorPictureCompression.LzwPic
member.summary: Use LZW compression.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorPictureCompression.JpxPic
member.summary: Use JPEG 2000 Part 2 (JPX).

member.name: T:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.SegmentationOptionsFlags
member.summary: Flags that identify certain segmentation options.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.SegmentationOptionsFlags.FavorOneBit
member.summary: Favor 1 bit images whenever there's minimum data loss.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.SegmentationOptionsFlags.WithBackground
member.summary: With Background images. Search for background within the image.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.SegmentationOptionsFlags.FavorTwoBit
member.summary: Favor 2 bit images whenever there's minimum data loss.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.SegmentationOptionsFlags.ForceOneBit
member.summary: Force 1 bit images whenever data loss is within accepted range.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.SegmentationOptionsFlags.ForceTwoBit
member.summary: Force 2 bit images whenever data loss is within accepted range.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.SegmentationOptionsFlags.WithoutBackground
member.summary: Without Background images.

member.name: T:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.SegmentTypeFlags
member.summary: Flags that identify the type of the segment.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.SegmentTypeFlags.Background
member.summary: The segment uses one color that represents the image background.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.SegmentTypeFlags.OneBit
member.summary: The segment is a 1BPP image.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.SegmentTypeFlags.OnBitBW
member.summary: The segment is a 1BPP black and white image.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.SegmentTypeFlags.TwoBit
member.summary: The segment is a 2BPP image.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.SegmentTypeFlags.TwoBitGray
member.summary: The segment is a 2BPP gray scale image.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.SegmentTypeFlags.Gray
member.summary: The segment is a gray scale image.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.SegmentTypeFlags.Picture
member.summary: The segment is a picture.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.SegmentTypeFlags.TwoBitBW
member.summary: The segment is a 2BPP black and white image.

member.name: F:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.SegmentTypeFlags.OneColor
member.summary: The segment has only one color.

member.name: T:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorCompressionTypes
member.summary: Provides information about the PDF Compression options.

member.name: P:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorCompressionTypes.Comp1Bit
member.summary: Gets or sets the compression to be used for 1BPP images. The default compression for 1BPP segments is Jbig2.
member.value: The compression to be used for 1BPP images. The default compression for 1BPP segments is Jbig2.

member.name: P:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorCompressionTypes.Comp2Bit
member.summary: Gets or sets the compression to be used for 2BPP images. The default compression for 2BPP segments is Zip2Bit.
member.value: The compression to be used for 2BPP images. The default compression for 2BPP segments is Zip2Bit.

member.name: P:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorCompressionTypes.CompPicture
member.summary: Gets or sets the compression to be used for pictures. The default compression for picture segments is Jpg411Pic.
member.value: The compression to be used for pictures. The default compression for picture segments is Jpg411Pic.

member.name: P:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorCompressionTypes.Empty
member.summary: Initializes the PdfCompressorCompressionTypes structure with default values.
member.value: A structure initialized with the PdfCompressorCompressionTypes default values.

member.name: P:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorCompressionTypes.Flags
member.summary: Gets or sets the flags that identify which fields of the PdfCompressorCompressionTypes structure are to be used.
member.value: The flags that identify which fields of the PdfCompressorCompressionTypes structure are to be used.

member.name: P:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorCompressionTypes.QFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets the quality factor value (valid only for JPEG compression). The default quality factor is 50.
member.value: The quality factor value (valid only for JPEG compression). The default quality factor is 50.

member.name: T:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorOptions
member.summary: Provides information about PDF Compressor options.

member.name: P:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorOptions.BackGroundThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets a threshold value used to separate image objects from the background.
member.value: Best values are from 5 to 35.

member.name: P:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorOptions.CleanSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that defines the size of the area to be used when removing the noise inside the segmented image.
member.value: Possible values range from 0 to 10.

member.name: P:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorOptions.ColorThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets a threshold value used when merging segments.
member.value: Best values are from 75 to 125.

member.name: P:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorOptions.CombineThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets a threshold value used to combine colors.
member.value: The best value is 25.

member.name: P:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorOptions.Empty
member.summary: Initializes the PdfCompressorOptions structure with default values.
member.value: A structure initialized with the PdfCompressorOptions default values.

member.name: P:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorOptions.Flags
member.summary: Gets or sets the segmentation flags.
member.value: The segmentation flags.

member.name: P:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorOptions.ImageQuality
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the quality of the source image.
member.value: A value that indicates the quality of the source image.

member.name: P:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorOptions.OutputQuality
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the quality of the output image.
member.value: A value that indicates the quality of the output image.

member.name: P:Leadtools.PdfCompressor.PdfCompressorOptions.SegmentQuality
member.summary: Gets or sets a threshold value used to determine whether the segment is a picture segment.
member.value: Possible values range from 0 to 100.
